mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mail_auth_info VALUES (#{email}, #{auth_code}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE auth_code = #{auth_code}
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_idx ,m.member_name ,c.company_name ,m.member_id ,m.profile_picture_url ,m.member_email ,m.address_name ,m.token ,typ.code_name as member_type FROM member m LEFT JOIN company c ON m.company_idx = c.company_idx LEFT JOIN common_code typ ON typ.code = m.member_type WHERE m.member_id = #{member_id}
